title: Print, "Book Ornament of a Classical Ruin with the Medallion Portrait of Francesco Algarotti (1712-1764)", ca. 1760
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Portrait to right; behind the head is printed 10-letter word in Greek alphabet.  Under the medallioin is a relief showing a compass, a wreath, and a lyre.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Book Ornament of a Classical Ruin with the Medallion Portrait of Francesco Algarotti (1712-1764)", ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Etching on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1944-24-38.
